publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-574# Mr Adam Ingram: Carers of the Mentally Ill—That the Parliament congratulates Trust a Carers Connection for its work in highlighting the problems of carers of the mentally ill in Ayrshire; recognises the invaluable contribution made by carers of the mentally ill generally; acknowledges the specific needs of these carers, which differ significantly from other carers, and believes that explicit and comprehensive attention must be paid to their needs and the needs of those in their care. Supported by: Fiona McLeod, Alex Neil
